title: Knockout Lee sin skin...Knock out Vi?
body: It would only make sense to give Vi some boxing gloves

replies.body:
Well, Lee usually uses his legs to fight, so Knockout Lee was some sort of a "joke" because he never uses his fists.

So I guess Vi needs a skin where she uses her legs instead of her arms?

Is that even possible? :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Aory,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sYIoQHMg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-12T17:54:40.334+0000)
>
> Well, Lee usually uses his legs to fight, so Knockout Lee was some sort of a "joke" because he never uses his fists.
> 
> So I guess Vi needs a skin where she uses her legs instead of her arms?
> 
> Is that even possible? :^)

It'd be possible but instead of gauntlets she would have THE INFINITY TOES! (Kudos to whoever gets the reference)

not the infinity toes
Well, lee also has a muay thai skin..which is mainly a leg/knee based martial art..so maybe give her a Traditional martial arts gi?
Muay Thai Vi is also very fun to say!
No. Actually star guardian Vi. Just imagine. Her. A star guardian. She is gona hate every second of it.

Never gonna happen because God fist is unique to Lee
Just like God Staff is for jax
OMG OMG OMG I LOVE THIS! +1
I've always wanted a bare knuckle Vi skin
i always wanted a vi skin that didnt make her ROOOOOOOOOOOOARRRRWARWARWARWARA into my ear everytime i attacked a jungle camp...so annoying.

OMG IS THAT THE ACTUAL FAKER?
I want SG Vi or Arcade Vi..

No, make Vi user her legs considering Lee's playstyle was mostly kicks.

Capoeria Vi.
